title: KHR_materials_diffuse_roughness glTF material extension
description: glTF extension that defines roughness of the base diffuse surface.

diffuseRoughnessTexture.description: A texture representing the diffuse layer's roughness, stored in the R channel.
diffuseRoughnessTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: A texture with the diffuse layer's roughness stored in the R channel. The value will modulate the diffuseRoughnessFactor.
